SEARCH
Package Distributed.ClientRMI

Class ClientApp

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
Distributed.ClientRMI.ClientApp
All Implemented Interfaces:
AbstractClient, Client, Serializable, Remote
public class ClientApp extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Client, AbstractClient
ClientApp is a class which extends UnicastRemoteObject and implements Client and AbstractClient It implements the RMI Client and all the methods through which it communicates with the RMI Server amd the ViewInterface
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • println

      public void println(String arg)
      This method is invoked by the view method inputHandler() to catch the input of a client from the keyboard. It invokes the server handler method, passing the input of the client as a parameter.
      Specified by:
      println in interface AbstractClient
      Parameters:
      arg - the input written by the client (caught by the view)

    • update

      public void update(BoardView boardView, String arg) throws RemoteException
      This method is invoked by the server every time that a move is made. It invokes the view update and sets the boardView to the client.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Client
      Parameters:
      boardView - the serializable boardView
      arg - a message from the server (not always used)
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • execute

      public static void execute(String typeOfView, String ip)
      This method asks the Client which type of View does it want; then creates an instance of ClientApp and connects it to the server through the method run().
      Parameters:
      typeOfView - the type of View can be TUI (textual user interface) or GUI (graphical user interface)
      ip - the IP address the Client connects to

    • run

      public void run(String serverHost) throws Exception
      This method take a reference of the Server from the RMI Registry and "connects" the Client to it.
      Parameters:
      serverHost - the IP address or the name of the Server the Client connects to
      Throws:
      Exception

    • beat

      public boolean beat() throws RemoteException
      This method is invoked periodically by the Server to check if the Client is still connected. It is used to implement the disconnection resilience.
      Specified by:
      beat in interface Client
      Returns:
      true
      Throws:
      RemoteException
